it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Client.CLI

Class ZeroLevelContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Client.CLI.Context
      • it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Client.CLI.ZeroLevelContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ZeroLevelContext
extends Context
implements java.lang.Runnable
    ZeroLevelContext is the context which is open every time the client hasn't an action to perform or there isn't any active context. It is implemented as a Thread to stop when a CONTEXT message has been received, and then to reactivate when the context has ended its functionality. The main action can be performed from the ZeroLevelContext are open the show card dialog open the chat room open the context which allows the client to change his name open the leader action handler context open the action context allows to end the turn without perform any action
    See Also:
    Context
